Package com.topcoder.search.builder.ldap

Class Summary
AndFragmentBuilder This SearchFragmentBuilder is used to handle building the SearchContext for the AndFilter for LDAP.
EqualsFragmentBuilder This SearchFragmentBuilder is used to handle building the SearchContext for the EqualsFilter for LDAP.
InFragmentBuilder This SearchFragmentBuilder is used to handle building the SearchContext for the InFilter for LDAP.
LDAPConnectionInformation This class includes all the information needed to create a LDAP connection.
LDAPConnectionStrategy It holds the Connection object used to conduct search.
LDAPSearchStrategy This is a Search Strategy that is tuned for searching an LDAP data store.
LDAPSearchStringBuilder This class is an concrete impelementor of SearchStringBuilder interface.
LikeFragmentBuilder This SearchFragmentBuilder is used to handle building the SearchContext for the LikeFilter for LDAP.
NotFragmentBuilder This SearchFragmentBuilder is used to handle building the SearchContext for the NotFilter for LDAP.
NullFragmentBuilder This SearchFragmentBuilder is used to handle building the SearchContext for the NullFilter for LDAP.
OrFragmentBuilder This SearchFragmentBuilder is used to handle building the SearchContext for the OrFilter for LDAP.
RangeFragmentBuilder This SearchFragmentBuilder is used to handle building the SearchContext for the GreaterThanFilter, LessThanFilter, GreaterThanOrEqualToFilter, LessThanOrEqualToFilter, and BetweenFilter for LDAP.
